Q2: If the contact already exists and the account field is empty when qualifying a lead, a new account record will be created when the lead is converted. The new account will be associated with the newly created opportunity and the existing contact record.

This is because an opportunity record requires an associated account record, and if the account field is left empty, a new account record must be created to fulfill this requirement. The existing contact will be associated with the new account and opportunity records as the primary contact.
